name: GOD'S QUIZ
description:
A quiz-game where your goal is to get the questions wrong to progress. It has a story with 4 different endings. Can you get them all?

This is GOD.

GOD is nice.

GOD wants you to win.

GOD wants you to have cake.

Don't let GOD down.

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0

Failure is progress.

Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.
